definitions.definition: A condition, subject or affair, especially one of concern.

definitions.example: I stayed for a matter of months.

definitions.definition: The essence; the pith; the embodiment.
Inducing cause or reason, especially of anything disagreeable or distressing.

definitions.example: Sorry for pouring ketchup on your clean white shirt! - Oh, don't worry, it does not matter.

definitions.definition: (in negative constructions) To care about, to mind; to find important.
To form pus or matter, as an abscess; to maturate.
